text: Tini tomadera jan'ye dbinera ksetre se patha'i nidharita karechena, yara adesa diyechilena nuhake, ya ami pratyadesa karechi apanara prati ebam yara adesa diyechilama ibrahima, musa o isake e'i marme ye, tomara dbinake pratisthita kara ebam tate anaikya srsti karo na. Apani musarekaderake ye bisayera prati amantrana janana, ta tadera kache duhsadhya bale mane haya. Allaha yake iccha manonita karena ebam ye tamra abhimukhi haya, take patha pradarsana karena.
